in difficult times it is the vulnerable

Global crisis of an unprecedented scale
divides among countries that widening

to narrow these divides and ensure
harmonious coexistence among all nations

United with the United Nations at its
core

divide climate divide and digital divide

like the essential infrastructure

Korea is set to boldly increase its
official development assistance volume
despite this year's fiscal austerity
measures the Korean government has
raised the Oda budget planned for the
upcoming year by over 40 percent
as a result compared to the fiscal year
of 2019 Korea's Oda budget is expected
to more than double next year
we'll allocate the increased Oda funds

in particular we'll actively Channel our

worsening the crises in countries

to assist the countries vulnerable to

scale up its green Oda
in particular we'll contribute an

we anticipate the international
community's active financial support for

Korea will not only harness renewable
energy
but also extensively employ high

realistic measure to hasten our pursuit

we also plan to share these energy

will launch a carbon-free Alliance an

the solidarity
the basis of Korea's foreign policy is
